CustomField.description: -Financial reporting: Prepare financial reports for management & authorities' submission in a timely manner -Financial governance: track financial transactions, manage performance & control data, compliance, operations, & disclosures. -Ensure all revenue & cost have been properly taken up in the correct accounting period with error below 5% -Sales report -Resolve issues in accounts & reconciliation on General Ledger -Ad-hoc reports -Consistency: for classification of information in the report
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Financial reporting: Prepare financial reports for management & authorities' submission in a timely manner -Financial governance: track financial transactions, manage performance & control data, compliance, operations, & disclosures. -Ensure all revenue & cost have been properly taken up in the correct accounting period with error below 5% -Sales report -Resolve issues in accounts & reconciliation on General Ledger -Ad-hoc reports -Consistency: for classification of information in the report
CustomField.label: Financial Management
